casebody.data:
99-0576 (La. 4/23/99)

Lawrence EVERAGE, Jr. and Richard Daggs v. DEPARTMENT OF POLICE through the CITY OF NEW ORLEANS, Richard J. Pennington, Superintendent of Police, Christopher H. Harris, and Toyota Motor Credit Corporation. No. 99-C-0576. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 23, 1999.

IN RE: Everage, Lawrence Jr. Et Al; Daggs, Richard; — Plaintiff(s); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review; Parish of Orleans Civil District Court Div. “J” Number 97-8092; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, Number 98CA-0923

Denied.

VICTORY, J. not on panel.
